scripts.graph: terragrunt graph -draw-cycles > graph.gv && dot -Tsvg graph.gv > graph.svg
scripts.key:generate: ssh-keygen -t rsa -m PEM -f kp-$(jq -r '.name' package.json)-app-$(terragrunt workspace show).pem -N '' -C '' && chmod 400 kp-$(jq -r '.name' package.json)-app-$(terragrunt workspace show).pem
scripts.download:keypair: aws s3 cp s3://tf-common-backend/env:/$(terragrunt workspace show)/$(jq -r '.name' package.json)/kp-$(jq -r '.name' package.json)-app-$(terragrunt workspace show).pem .
scripts.upload:keypair: aws s3 cp kp-$(jq -r '.name' package.json)-app-$(terragrunt workspace show).pem s3://tf-common-backend/env:/$(terragrunt workspace show)/$(jq -r '.name' package.json)/kp-$(jq -r '.name' package.json)-app-$(terragrunt workspace show).pem
scripts.download:tfvars: aws s3 cp s3://tf-common-backend/env:/$(terragrunt workspace show)/$(jq -r '.name' package.json)/terraform.tfvars .
scripts.upload:tfvars: aws s3 cp terraform.tfvars s3://tf-common-backend/env:/$(terragrunt workspace show)/$(jq -r '.name' package.json)/terraform.tfvars
scripts.connect: ssh -i kp-$(jq -r '.name' package.json)-app-$(terragrunt workspace show).pem $(jq -r '.app_instance_username.value' output.json)@$(jq -r '.app_instance_public_ip.value' output.json)
scripts.restart:app: yarn connect sudo docker restart $(jq -r '.app_container_name_prefix.value' output.json)1
scripts.download:db: scp -i kp-$(jq -r '.name' package.json)-app-$(terragrunt workspace show).pem $(jq -r '.app_instance_username.value' output.json)@$(jq -r '.app_instance_public_ip.value' output.json):$(jq -r '.data_volume_mount_path.value' output.json)/document.db .
scripts.upload:db: scp -i kp-$(jq -r '.name' package.json)-app-$(terragrunt workspace show).pem document.db $(jq -r '.app_instance_username.value' output.json)@$(jq -r '.app_instance_public_ip.value' output.json):$(jq -r '.data_volume_mount_path.value' output.json)/document.db
